lead_paragraph: Andrew Luck has signed the richest contract in NFL history, a deal worth up to $140 million with the Indianapolis Colts that covers the next six seasons through 2021.

headline.print_headline: Colts Give QB Andrew Luck $140M Contract Extension
headline.main: Colts Give QB Andrew Luck $140M Contract Extension
